title: Since Nightmare Tryn isn't released yet...
body:
I hope that means they are changing his VO and his W to fit the "Nightmare" theme.    And how about that recall animation?  

Oh, it's a 1350 rp skin now?   nooo problem!

replies.body:
No dice. :P

I'm curious what you'd want for a recall, though.
The Silent Fill fog should surround him with the creepy radio noise playing.

Recall.....since Pyramid head is sort of Spazzy and this skin is inspired by him, maybe like slamming his sword into the ground making a sort of artificial head cock to the side and an out of place shoulder twitch and mists start to surround him. Since if this skin was canon to Runeterra Lore Nightmare Tryndamere would be from the Shadow Isles and the black mist is sort of that trademark. You could have the mists swirl around him and he would disappear or he would float upwards with the mist swirling around.
Nope. The skin is still gonna be 750 it's just not released right away with the patch. They've done this for a long long time.
Wait... are you really expecting Riot to work? Ha!
